patthana15.47:1.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.47:2.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṃ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
